channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Ultimate-Premium-Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Ultimate-Premium-Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-1166|2023-06-27T13:17:21.743Z -- unknown -- ultimate-premium-plugin
item.description: The USM-Premium WordPress plugin before 16.3 does not sanitize and escape some of its settings, which could allow high-privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example, in multisite setup).
